fields.Title: Mental health screening in Idaho's Juvenile Detention Centers: Results of a four-year evaluation
fields.Description/Abstract:
Describes key findings of four years of evaluating the Idaho Department of Juvenile Corrections' Clinical Services program.  Paper submitted for presentation at the October 2012 meeting American Public Health Association in San Francisco, CA.
Partners:  Idaho Department of Juvenile Corrections
Description of Partner:  Conducting evaluation of IDJC's Clinical Services program housing clinicians in Idaho's 12 juvenile detention centers
Role:  Principal
